alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 4:46PM CDT until September 06 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR EASTERN UNION...NORTHWESTERN ITAWAMBA AND NORTHERN LEE COUNTIES... At 446 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blair, or 8 miles southwest of Baldwyn, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, New Albany, Baldwyn, Tombigbee State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Mantachie, Keownville, New Harmony, Blair, Sherman, Blue Springs, Jericho, Branyan, Mooreville, Ellistown, Eggville, Ballardsville, Jug Fork and Baker. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
